content.text:
# 2025–26 Independence Cup (Bangladesh)

The 2025–26 Independence Cup will be 14th edition of the Independence Cup domestic annual top-tier club football competition in Bangladesh which play only local footballers, organized by Bangladesh Football Federation (BFF). A total of 10 teams will contested in the tournament.
Bashundhara Kings is the defending champion. They have won the title by beating Dhaka Mohammedan by 2−1 goals in the final on 18 December 2023.
Participating teams
The following ten participants will participate in the tournament.

Venues
The venues of the competition has not finished yet.
